mapper.insert: insert into ecs_ecsmart_payment (pay_id, pay_code, pay_name, pay_fee, pay_order, enabled, is_cod, is_online, pay_desc, pay_config) values (#{pay_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{pay_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pay_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pay_fee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pay_order,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{is_cod,jdbcType=BIT}, #{is_online,jdbcType=BIT}, #{pay_desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{pay_config,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_ecsmart_payment set pay_code = #{pay_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_name = #{pay_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_fee = #{pay_fee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_order = #{pay_order,jdbcType=TINYINT}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, is_cod = #{is_cod,jdbcType=BIT}, is_online = #{is_online,jdbcType=BIT}, pay_desc = #{pay_desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, pay_config = #{pay_config,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where pay_id = #{pay_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}
mapper.select: select pay_id, pay_code, pay_name, pay_fee, pay_order, enabled, is_cod, is_online, pay_desc, pay_config from ecs_ecsmart_payment where pay_id = #{pay_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}
